metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for child character
metadata.age_appropriate_note: CRITICAL: All scenes must be completely age-appropriate for a 9-year-old child

scenes.title: Morning Light
scenes.lighting: soft morning light through floral curtains
scenes.description: A 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin and dark brown curly hair sleeps in a small bed with a pink comforter decorated with butterflies. The room has pink and purple walls, stuffed animals on the bed (teddy bear, unicorn), posters of cartoon characters, a small desk with school supplies, a bookshelf with children's books. Morning light filters through floral curtains.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin, dark brown curly hair sleeping in small bed, pink butterfly comforter, teddy bear and unicorn stuffed animals on bed, pink and purple walls, cartoon posters, small desk with school supplies, bookshelf, soft morning light through floral curtains, cheerful child's bedroom, peaceful sleep
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, dark room, scary, inappropriate

scenes.title: Stretching in Bed
scenes.description: Isabella sits up in bed, stretching her arms overhead, yawning widely. Her dark curly hair is messy from sleep. She wears pink pajamas with unicorn prints. She rubs her eyes. The teddy bear has fallen to the floor.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin, dark brown messy curly hair, sitting up in bed stretching arms overhead, yawning widely, wearing pink unicorn pajamas, rubbing eyes, teddy bear fallen on floor, pink butterfly comforter, child waking up, cheerful bedroom, morning
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, neat hair, inappropriate

scenes.title: Making Bed
scenes.description: Isabella pulls up the pink butterfly comforter, attempting to make her bed. The job isn't perfect—a child's effort—but she tries. She places the teddy bear against the pillow. Abuela (grandmother, gray hair in bun) watches from the doorway approvingly.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin, dark curly hair, wearing pink pajamas, making bed, pulling up pink butterfly comforter (not perfectly), placing teddy bear against pillow, elderly grandmother with gray hair bun watching approvingly from doorway, child's effort at chores, cheerful bedroom, morning light
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, perfect bed making, adult, teenager, alone, inappropriate

scenes.title: Braiding Hair
scenes.description: Abuela parts Isabella's hair down the middle, beginning to braid one side. Her weathered hands work expertly, weaving the dark curls into a neat braid. Isabella watches in the vanity mirror, holding a white ribbon ready.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly grandmother with gray hair bun braiding 9-year-old Colombian girl's dark curly hair, sitting at small vanity with mirror, grandmother's weathered hands weaving neat braid, girl holding white ribbon ready, watching reflection in mirror, bedroom morning light, loving grandmother-granddaughter moment, hair styling
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, alone, adult girl, straight hair, inappropriate

scenes.title: School Uniform Complete
scenes.description: Isabella stands before a full-length mirror on her closet door, checking her complete school uniform: white blouse, navy jumper, white knee-high socks, black Mary Jane shoes, hair in neat braids with white ribbons. She straightens her collar, smiles—ready for school.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin, dark curly hair in neat braids with white ribbons, standing at full-length mirror checking school uniform, navy blue jumper dress, white blouse, white knee-high socks, black Mary Jane shoes, cheerful smile with small gap in teeth, ready for school, bedroom morning light
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, messy uniform, adult, teenager, inappropriate, casual clothes

scenes.title: Using Step Stool
scenes.description: Isabella stands on a pink plastic step stool to reach the sink. She's still in pajamas. She looks at herself in the mirror—messy curly hair, sleepy face. The step stool is pink to match her bathroom accessories.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin, dark brown messy curly hair, wearing pink unicorn pajamas, standing on pink plastic step stool at bathroom sink, looking at sleepy reflection in mirror, child-height issue solved with step stool, bright bathroom lighting, morning routine beginning
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, tall enough without stool, inappropriate

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Isabella brushes her teeth with a pink children's toothbrush. Kids' toothpaste (strawberry flavor) is on the counter. She brushes carefully, foam around her mouth, watching herself in the mirror. Her small gap between front teeth is visible when she smiles.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin, messy dark curly hair, brushing teeth with pink children's toothbrush, standing on step stool at sink, white foam around mouth, watching reflection in mirror, small gap between front teeth visible, kids' strawberry toothpaste on counter, bright bathroom light, morning hygiene routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult toothbrush, adult, perfect teeth, inappropriate

scenes.title: Bath Time
scenes.description: Isabella takes an evening bath. Mamá supervises. The bathtub has some bubbles and bath toys (a rubber duck, a small boat). Isabella plays briefly, then Mamá helps wash her hair. Clean for bed.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin in bathtub with bubbles, dark curly wet hair, playing with rubber duck bath toy, mother figure nearby supervising (partially visible), toy boat in water, warm bath time scene, bright bathroom light, evening routine, child-appropriate bath scene
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, inappropriate, suggestive, no adult supervision, alone in bath

scenes.title: Rinsing and Spitting
scenes.description: Isabella rinses her mouth, spits into the sink, rinses again with water from a cup. She wipes her mouth with the back of her hand, then properly with a towel. Toothbrush goes back in the cup.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin, dark curly hair, standing at bathroom sink on step stool, rinsing mouth and spitting, using small cup for water, colorful cartoon towel nearby, putting pink toothbrush back in cup, completing brushing teeth routine, bright bathroom light
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, inappropriate, dirty

scenes.title: Hair Dried and Brushed
scenes.description: Mamá dries Isabella's hair with a towel, then brushes out the curls gently. No braids now—natural curls for bed. Isabella is in her nightgown (pink with cartoon characters). Almost bedtime.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, mother drying 9-year-old Colombian girl's dark curly wet hair with towel, then gently brushing out curls, girl wearing pink nightgown with cartoon characters, natural curls for bedtime (no braids), post-bath hair care, warm motherly moment, bedroom or bathroom setting, evening light
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, alone, inappropriate, rough handling

scenes.title: Breakfast Served
scenes.description: Mamá places breakfast in front of Isabella: arepas with cheese, scrambled eggs, a slice of fresh papaya. Typical Colombian Caribbean breakfast. A glass of fresh mango juice. Isabella's eyes light up—she loves papaya.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, mother placing breakfast plate in front of 9-year-old Colombian girl at kitchen table, arepa with cheese, scrambled eggs, fresh papaya slice on colorful child's plate, glass of orange mango juice, girl with light brown skin, dark curly braids with white ribbons, school uniform, excited expression, bright yellow kitchen walls, morning light, Colombian breakfast
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, American breakfast, cereal, alone, dark kitchen, inappropriate

scenes.title: Eating Breakfast
scenes.description: Isabella eats breakfast, fork cutting into scrambled eggs. She takes a bite of arepa with cheese. The papaya slice is already half-gone—her favorite. The family eats together, morning conversation flowing.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin, dark curly braids with white ribbons, school uniform, eating breakfast at kitchen table, fork cutting scrambled eggs, bite of arepa with cheese, half-eaten papaya slice (her favorite), glass of juice, cheerful expression, family members partially visible, bright yellow kitchen, morning family breakfast
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, alone eating, messy eating, inappropriate, dark room

scenes.title: Family Breakfast Scene
scenes.description: The whole family at breakfast: Papá eating and checking phone, Mamá seated with coffee, Abuela with her breakfast, Isabella finishing her eggs. A Colombian family morning.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, Colombian family breakfast scene at kitchen table, 9-year-old girl with school uniform eating, father checking phone while eating, mother with coffee cup, elderly grandmother (abuela) with gray hair, bright yellow kitchen walls, morning light through window, warm family atmosphere, everyone together at meal
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, alone, empty table, dark kitchen, inappropriate, single person

scenes.title: Afternoon Snack
scenes.description: Abuela has prepared an afternoon snack (onces): a glass of cold juice and a small empanada. Isabella sits at the kitchen table eating. Abuela sits with her own cup of coffee, listening to Isabella's school stories.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin, dark curly hair in casual style, wearing pink t-shirt and shorts, sitting at kitchen table eating afternoon snack, glass of cold juice, small empanada on plate, elderly grandmother sitting with coffee cup listening to school stories, bright yellow kitchen, afternoon light, warm intergenerational moment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, alone, school uniform, dark kitchen, inappropriate

scenes.title: Clearing Her Plate
scenes.description: Isabella carries her plate to the sink (with help from the step stool). Mamá takes it from her. 'Thank you, mi amor.' Isabella is learning to help with small tasks. The breakfast dishes pile up for later.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 9-year-old Colombian girl with light brown skin, dark curly braids, school uniform, carefully carrying breakfast plate to kitchen sink, standing on step stool to reach, mother taking plate from her, learning to help with chores, 'thank you mi amor' moment, breakfast dishes nearby, bright yellow kitchen, morning, child helping with housework
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, dropping plate, messy, alone, dark kitchen, inappropriate
